scripts.install:win32: copy node_modules\qrllib\build\web-libjsqrl.wasm public\ && copy node_modules\ledger-qrl-js\browser\ledger.js public\ && copy node_modules\ledger-qrl-js\wallet\qrl-ledger-library.js public\
scripts.install:darwin: sleep 10 && cp node_modules/qrllib/build/web-libjsqrl.wasm public/ && cp node_modules/ledger-qrl-js/browser/ledger.js public/ && cp node_modules/ledger-qrl-js/wallet/qrl-ledger-library.js public/
scripts.install:linux: sleep 10 && cp node_modules/qrllib/build/web-libjsqrl.wasm public/ && cp node_modules/ledger-qrl-js/browser/ledger.js public/ && cp node_modules/ledger-qrl-js/wallet/qrl-ledger-library.js public/
